name: Ext_R5_Subscription_maxCount
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Subscription.maxCount for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Subscription.maxCount from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Subscription|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Maximum number of events that can be combined in a single notification
element.definition: If present, the maximum number of events that will be included in a notification bundle. Note that this is not a strict limit on the number of entries in a bundle, as dependent resources can be included.
element.comment: `Subscription.maxCount` has no related element in R4B:Subscription
